// Satyamev Jayate !

#define _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS 1
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<climits>
#define boost ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false)
using namespace std;
#define M 1000000000+7
#define lld long long
#define mp make_pair
inline lld max(lld a, lld b)
{
	return a > b ? a : b;
}
int comp(int a, int b)
{
	if (a > b)
	return 1;
	else
	return 0;
}
bool Comp(pair<lld, int>a, pair<lld, int>b)
{
	if (a.first > b.first)
		return 1;
	else if (a.first == b.first)
	{
		return a.second < b.second ? 1 : 0;
	}
	else
		return 0;
}
long gcd(long a, long b)
{
	if (a%b == 0)
		return b;
	else
	return gcd(b, a%b);
}
int main()
{
	long n, s, m,q,k;
	boost;
	cin >> n;
	vector<pair<lld,int> >v;
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
	{
		cin >> s >> m;
		lld val = (lld)s*m;
		v.push_back(mp(val,i));
	}
	sort(v.begin(), v.end(), Comp);
	cin >> q;
	for (int i = 0; i < q; i++)
	{
		cin >> k;
		cout << v[k - 1].second+1 << endl;
	}
}
